PerfectNetExp.abs: hurly 哈利, hurlyburly 英格兰雷暴, hurlyburly 喧闹

entry.def: If you talk about the hurly-burly of a situation, you are emphasizing how noisy or busy it is.

example.ex: No one expects him to get involved in the hurly-burly of campaigning.
example.tran: 谁也没有料到他会加入到乱哄哄的竞选活动。

auth_sentence.content: When the hurlyburly's done, When the battle's lost and won.
auth_sentence.res_content: When the hurlyburly's done, When the battle's lost and won.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When the hurlyburly's done, When the battle's lost and won.
